content.question: Kennedy’s strategies expressed in the excerpt have the most in common with which of the following?

choices.label: Richard Nixon’s strategy of détente with the Soviet Union in the 1970s
Jimmy Carter’s response to the oil crisis in the 1970s
Ronald Reagan’s rhetoric about the Soviet Union in the 1980s
Bill Clinton’s advocacy of free trade agreements in the 1990s

content.answer: Ronald Reagan’s rhetoric about the Soviet Union in the 1980s

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
